aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-5190-482 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Lightning strike damage assessment. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 23/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 26/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 27/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 26/02/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 04/03/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
